alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:47AM EDT until July 30 at 5:36AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A FLOOD WARNING IS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...The Flood Warning is for portions of the Kentucky counties of Floyd, Knott, Letcher, and Pike. * WHEN...The Flood Warning is in effect until noon EDT. * IMPACTS...Some roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 AM EDT, flooding was ongoing. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Hindman, Bath, Wheelwright, Fleming-Neon, Pippa Passes, Hall, Ivan, Greenleaf, Kite, Dry Creek, Omaha, Deane, Democrat, Halo, Drew, May, Topmost, Nealy, Hollybush and Lester.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
